name: Marking Public Affairs bvba
goal: To offer strategic advice to health and social affairs stakeholders (companies, NGOs, think tanks, policy makers) with the aim to put/keep their issues on the EU policy agenda and support the implementation of these public affairs strategies
interests: Budget, Consumer Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Food Safety, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
- EU research activities (Horizon2020, FP9)
- EU health policy and activities (incl. Health Programme)
- Social Pillar
- Social Innovation Package/Social OMC
- Pharmaceutical policy and legislation (personalised medicines, biosimilars, natural medicine, homeopathy)
- AHA-EIP
- chronic disease initiatives (including mental health)
- health inequalities
- EAsI
- Social Protection Committee
- European Semester
